instance.description: VTEX instance identifier (e.g., myaccount, myaccountvtexio). Empty for default configuration.

apiGroup.description: Category/group name for the API (e.g., Orders, Catalog, Pricing)

operationId.description: Unique identifier for the API operation

enabled.description: Whether this favorite is active and available for use

description.description: Human-readable description of the favorite operation

httpMethod.description: HTTP method for the operation (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
